useCase.name: Add New Edge Agent
useCase.description: Alice adds a new edge agent with selected authorizations.

preconditions.precondition: Alice has chosen existing or add new device from options in Edge Agent Start.
Edge Agent 2 has been provisioned as described in the Provision New Agent diagram.

mainSequence.step: Alice adds agent 2 with selected authorizations.
Agent 1 displays provisioning code for adding agent 2.
Agent 2 sends request and keys to agent 1.
Agent 1 adds keys and authorizations for agent 2 to policy registry.
